sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Unsigned DLL Loaded by Windows Utility
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects windows utilities loading an unsigned or untrusted DLL.
Adversaries often abuse those programs to proxy execution of malicious code.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Scheduled Task Creation via Masqueraded XML File
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of a scheduled task using the "-XML" flag with a file without the '.xml' extension. This behavior could be indicative of potential defense evasion attempt during persistence

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Hashes=MD5=478BEAEC1C3A9417272BC8964ADD1CEE,SHA256=9A121ACF7686D2883E524332111D5E4BCC0C1A8E81136486FBA4CA65CA614407,IMPHASH=918DBB01101BFA7F1042CCA9520D2A05; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\U5qNKTv9q0m4D3Z.exe" ; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe" /Create /TN "Updates\aYRlrIt" /XML "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp9F0A.tmp"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\U5qNKTv9q0m4D3Z.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Hashes=MD5=478BEAEC1C3A9417272BC8964ADD1CEE,SHA256=9A121ACF7686D2883E524332111D5E4BCC0C1A8E81136486FBA4CA65CA614407,IMPHASH=918DBB01101BFA7F1042CCA9520D2A05; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\RegSvcs.exe"; CommandLine="schtasks.exe" /create /f /tn "DSL Service" /xml "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpF2D7.tmp"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\RegSvcs.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modifications to the Windows Defender configuration settings using PowerShell to add exclusions

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\aYRlrIt.exe; Path=; ScriptBlockId=fe9d3bd7-7bd6-415e-a8dc-cf60f1fef32c; MessageTotal=1; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}
@{ScriptBlockText=Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\aYRlrIt.exe; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=b6a9999f-19cf-4241-b8e1-c2ba1c684dc2; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of the "PSScriptPolicyTest" PowerShell script by an uncommon process. This file is usually generated by Microsoft Powershell to test against Applocker.

match_context.values: @{TargetFilename=%USERPROFILE%\AppData\Local\Temp\__PSScriptPolicyTest_fvefmtyz.e1n.ps1}
@{TargetFilename=%USERPROFILE%\AppData\Local\Temp\__PSScriptPolicyTest_iwivpksj.ntu.psm1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=MD5=C32CA4ACFCC635EC1EA6ED8A34DF5FAC,SHA256=73A3C4AEF5DE385875339FC2EB7E58A9E8A47B6161BDC6436BF78A763537BE70,IMPHASH=194427A488ED1DD0A91731658B071667; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\U5qNKTv9q0m4D3Z.exe" ; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\aYRlrIt.exe"; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\U5qNKTv9q0m4D3Z.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Hashes=SHA1=3D6861E137699ADD6E1DB51E2F9D96A9FC4F122D,MD5=1089F6E6C6C219009F75C637ED302F99,SHA256=5A1D9329C862C908B050896FEFA49628D00A914EE2155CEFCAA7704BD1A5E2C8,IMPHASH=FF24CEF596AA4AA9D65391184A89D008; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\U5qNKTv9q0m4D3Z.exe"; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Roaming\aYRlrIt.exe"; FileVersion=10.0.22621.2361 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\U5qNKTv9q0m4D3Z.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath "%USERPROFILE%\AppData\Roaming\aYRlrIt.exe"; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=1}
@{CommandLine=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=1}

@{CommandLine=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe Add-MpPreference -ExclusionPath C:\Users\<USER>\AppData\Roaming\aYRlrIt.exe; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=478BEAEC1C3A9417272BC8964ADD1CEE,SHA256=9A121ACF7686D2883E524332111D5E4BCC0C1A8E81136486FBA4CA65CA614407,IMPHASH=918DBB01101BFA7F1042CCA9520D2A05; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; FileVersion=10.0.19041.906 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\U5qNKTv9q0m4D3Z.exe" ; CommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe" /Create /TN "Updates\aYRlrIt" /XML "C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp9F0A.tmp"; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\U5qNKTv9q0m4D3Z.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\schtasks.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

signature_info.comments: A simple CSV file viewer and editor

configs: @{txt_configs=System.Object[]; files_dropped=System.Object[]; extra_info=; net_info=; implant_info=; host_info=; tool=MANDIANT_BACKSCATTER_MEMDUMP_ZENBOX}
